  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    FindingController
    we verify if the information about rides is correct and redirect the user to Show Rides Page to see rides which correspond to the information requested by him
    LandingController
    main page of the site the user can connect to offer a ride or to see rides
    LoginController
    the page where the user who already has an account logs in with his credentials
    OfferARideController
    the user who plans to make a ride in the future enters information about ride in the application
    ShowRidesController
    we display the matching rides with the information from the Find page
    SignUpController
    the page where a new user creates an account
